# elements

**Instance Property**

An array of fetch index element descriptions.

## Declaration

```swift
var elements: [NSFetchIndexElementDescription] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property to an invalid value throws an exception, such as when the new value includes both R-tree and non-R-tree elements.

## Inspecting an Index Description

- **entity**: The entity description for the fetch index description.
- **name**: The name of the fetch index description.
- **partialIndexPredicate**: A predicate that selects rows for indexing, if the index is a partial index.

items.description: The entity description for the fetch index description.
items.name: entity

items.description: The name of the fetch index description.
items.name: name

items.description: A predicate that selects rows for indexing, if the index is a partial index.
items.name: partialIndexPredicate
